meanings.prefixVisual: <path d='M4 14 a 8 8 0 0 0 16 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M18 6 l-4 8' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>

prefixIntro.title: 食物与物品
prefixIntro.description: 包含具体的食物、动植物、建筑和日常用品。
prefixIntro.imagery: 像一个装满生活必需品的百宝箱。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 10 a 6 6 0 0 1 12 0 v 8 a 2 2 0 0 1 -2 2 h -2 v -4 h -4 v 4 h -2 a 2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2 z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 一块经典的带骨肉排（T骨牛排），清晰地展示了肉的形态。

sentences.en: To lose weight, I decided to give up eating meat and have vegetables instead.
sentences.cn: 为了减肥，我决定不吃肉，改吃蔬菜。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 20 L8 6 L16 6 Z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M12 6 v-4' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M10 2 l2 -2 l2 2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/>
words.imagery: 一根顶端带有绿叶的胡萝卜，是蔬菜的典型代表。

sentences.en: You should eat more fresh vegetables every day.
sentences.cn: 你每天应该多吃新鲜蔬菜。

words.imagery: 标志性的大圆耳朵和圆润的脸庞，构成了老鼠最经典、最容易识别的卡通形象。
一条连绵起伏的锯齿状线条勾勒出山脉雄伟的天际线，捕捉了山峰与山谷的起伏韵律。这是大地伸向天空的原始签名.

sentences.en: There are so many mountains in Shanxi Province.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 20 h16 M6 18 V 8 l6 -4 l6 4 v10' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M10 18 v-6 M14 18 v-6' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/>
words.imagery: 一座有台阶和宏伟立柱的建筑，象征着庄严的知识殿堂。

sentences.en: The museum has a large collection of photographs.
sentences.cn: 这个博物馆收藏了大量的照片。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 14 a 8 8 0 0 0 16 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M7 10 q 2.5 -3 5 0 t 5 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M7 12 q 2.5 -3 5 0 t 5 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' opacity='0.7'/>
words.imagery: 一个半圆形的碗里盛着几条弯曲的波浪线，形象地代表了面条。

sentences.en: People from the northern part of China like to have noodles.
sentences.cn: 中国北方人喜欢吃面条。

words.imagery: 一个泪滴状的球茎，顶部长出嫩芽，底部生出细根，内部的线条暗示着它层层包裹的结构。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 17.5c-2.5 0-4.5-1.5-4.5-3.5c0-1.5 1-2.5 2.5-2.5c1 0 1.5.5 2 1.5c.5-1 1-1.5 2-1.5c1.5 0 2.5 1 2.5 2.5c0 2-2 3.5-4.5 3.5z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='8' cy='6' r='2' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='12' cy='5' r='2' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='16' cy='6' r='2' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个简单的爪印，是毛茸茸的朋友在我们生命中留下印记的通用符号。

sentences.en: I raised two pets, a dog and a cat.
sentences.cn: 我养了两只宠物，一只狗和一只猫。

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='8' width='16' height='8' rx='1' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M6 12 h2 M10 12 h2 M14 12 h2 M18 12 h2' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M8 8 v4 M12 8 v4 M16 8 v4' stroke='currentColor' fill='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 一段标志性的黑白琴键排列，直观地代表了钢琴。

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='6' width='16' height='12' rx='2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M6 10 q 4 -2 8 0 t 8 0 M6 14 q 4 -2 8 0 t 8 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/>
words.imagery: 一个矩形的水池，水面泛着粼粼的波光。

sentences.en: It is normal to have a swimming pool in the yard in Malaysia.
sentences.cn: 在马来西亚，院子里有游泳池是很正常的。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 12 a 8 8 0 0 0 16 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='10' cy='10' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='14' cy='10' r='0.5' fill='currentColor' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='12' cy='13' r='0.5' fill='currentColor' opacity='0.7'/>
words.imagery: 一个碗里装着粘稠的液体，上面点缀着几颗米粒，代表着粥。

sentences.en: My mum often cooks porridge for us in the morning.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈早上经常为我们煮粥。

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='8' width='16' height='12' rx='1' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M4 8 l8 -4 l8 4' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M10 12 h4 v4 h-4 z' fill='currentColor' opacity='0.3'/>
words.imagery: 一个信封的图标叠加在一个房子的轮廓上，清晰地表达了邮局的含义。

sentences.en: Is there a post office near here?

words.rootVisual: <ellipse cx='12' cy='14' rx='8' ry='5' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M10 12 l-1 -2 M14 12 l1 -1 M12 15 l-1 1' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/>
words.imagery: 一个不规则的椭圆形，上面有几个小点，代表土豆发芽的“眼睛”。

sentences.en: Do you like having potato chips?

words.rootVisual: <rect x='8' y='8' width='8' height='8' rx='1' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><rect x='6' y='16' width='12' height='4' rx='1' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='10' cy='12' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='14' cy='12' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><line x1='12' y1='8' x2='14' y2='4' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个由方块和圆形组成的经典机器人形象，方头方脑，头顶还有天线。

sentences.en: There will be a robot in each family in the near future.
sentences.cn: 在不久的将来，每个家庭都会有一个机器人。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M8 4 a4 4 0 1 1 0 8 a4 4 0 1 0 0 8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M16 4 a4 4 0 1 0 0 8 a4 4 0 1 1 0 8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/>
words.imagery: 两条相互缠绕的螺旋线，形成了麻花状，直观地表现出绳子的结构。
